headline.main: International Breaks a Boon for Chelsea Iron Man Terry
headline.print_headline: International Breaks a Boon for Chelsea Iron Man Terry

docs.snippet: Chelsea captain John Terry thinks quitting international football three years ago helped keep his fitness at a level where he was able to play every minute of the London club's triumphant English league season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea captain John Terry thinks quitting international football three years ago helped keep his fitness at a level where he was able to play every minute of the London club's triumphant English league season.

headline.main: China says South China Sea actions hinge on security
headline.sub: China says South China Sea actions hinge on security

docs.snippet: A senior military official says China's decision on whether to establish an air defence zone in the South China Sea hinges on security. Natasha Howitt reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: A senior military official says China's decision on whether to establish an air defence zone in the South China Sea hinges on security. Natasha Howitt reports.

headline.main: Blackhawks, Lightning to Face Off in Stanley Cup Final
headline.print_headline: Blackhawks, Lightning to Face Off in Stanley Cup Final

docs.snippet: Between the Chicago Blackhawks' veteran poise and the Tampa Bay Lightning's young stars, the Stanley Cup Final will have no shortage of dynamic offensive talent playing on hockey's biggest stage....
docs.lead_paragraph: Between the Chicago Blackhawks' veteran poise and the Tampa Bay Lightning's young stars, the Stanley Cup Final will have no shortage of dynamic offensive talent playing on hockey's biggest stage.

headline.main: Bombs in Southern Thailand Kill One Police Officer, Wound Seven
headline.print_headline: Bombs in Southern Thailand Kill One Police Officer, Wound Seven

docs.snippet: Roadside bombs in southern Thailand killed one police officer and wounded seven members of the security forces in a region scarred by a long-running Muslim separatist insurgency, police said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Roadside bombs in southern Thailand killed one police officer and wounded seven members of the security forces in a region scarred by a long-running Muslim separatist insurgency, police said on Sunday.

headline.main: Giant Cross Rises in Pakistan, Home to a Christian Minority
headline.print_headline: Giant Cross Rises in Pakistan, Home to a Christian Minority

docs.snippet: Now towering over this violent port city in Pakistan, where Islamic militant attacks and gangland shootings remain common, is an uncommon sight in this Muslim-majority country: a 42-meter (140-foot) Christian cross....
docs.lead_paragraph: Now towering over this violent port city in Pakistan, where Islamic militant attacks and gangland shootings remain common, is an uncommon sight in this Muslim-majority country: a 42-meter (140-foot) Christian cross.

headline.main: An Outfielder Makes His Debut With the Yankees in a Win Over the Athletics

docs.snippet: Ramon Flores is the fifth player this season to make his major league debut with the Yankees, who remain in first in the American League East with a win in Oakland....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ramon Flores is the fifth player this season to make his major league debut with the Yankees, who remain in first in the American League East with a win in Oakland.

headline.main: 92-Year-Old Becomes Oldest Woman to Finish Marathon
headline.print_headline: 92-Year-Old Becomes Oldest Woman to Finish Marathon

docs.snippet: A 92-year-old cancer survivor rocked her way into the record books Sunday, becoming the oldest woman to finish a marathon....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 92-year-old cancer survivor rocked her way into the record books Sunday, becoming the oldest woman to finish a marathon.

headline.main: Arab War Planes Bomb Yemen; Exiles Report U.S.-Houthi Talks
headline.print_headline: Arab War Planes Bomb Yemen; Exiles Report U.S.-Houthi Talks

docs.snippet: Aircraft from a Saudi-led coalition bombed Yemen's Houthi outposts throughout the country on Sunday, residents said, while Yemen's government in exile said the militia was in talks with the United States in Oman....
docs.lead_paragraph: Aircraft from a Saudi-led coalition bombed Yemen's Houthi outposts throughout the country on Sunday, residents said, while Yemen's government in exile said the militia was in talks with the United States in Oman.

headline.main: Singapore Hoping SEA Games Can Inspire Sporting Legacy
headline.print_headline: Singapore Hoping SEA Games Can Inspire Sporting Legacy

docs.snippet: Singapore is hoping spicy local rivalries at the Southeast Asian Games will prove far more appetising than the bland and expensive 2010 Youth Olympics as it bids once more to spark a sporting revolution....
docs.lead_paragraph: Singapore is hoping spicy local rivalries at the Southeast Asian Games will prove far more appetising than the bland and expensive 2010 Youth Olympics as it bids once more to spark a sporting revolution.
